name: Sequel5 Sequence-Board Games
description:
Sequel5 the new online sequence-board game is one of the very few gaming apps designed in multiplayer mode allowing users to play with up to 12 Sequel5 Robots in a game.

"Truly a polished game app performance with classic UI, the best board game available online" - Andrew S

FREE TO PLAY:
Sequel5 offers free gameplay with players choosing opponents from around the world. The only game perhaps that can be played with friends and family. The game supports strategic building of mind by letting the player play with multiple robots allowing them to build strategic skills naturally.

FUN WITH LOGIC
Why waste time unnecessarily when you can make the best of it building your mind adding points to analytical and observational skills? Invite your friends and family by giving your HOUSE-ID globally and add robots alongside. Play as a team and enjoy your time.

SIGNIFICANCE WITH OUTSIDE WORLD
Skills that can be polished:
STRATEGY
TEAM WORK
ANALYTICAL
OBSERVATIONAL
COMPETITION

HIGH-END PRIZES with TOURNAMENTS: Coming Soon
